title: Infiltrating the Pack
description: For Mature Adult Audiences. Contains language and actions some may deem offensive. Sexually explicit content. Ménage – MMF – MM scenes.In book two of Shifter With the Redeemer in custody, Vander and Jewel must find out who is still following through with his plans because the killings haven't stopped. When dreams start for Vander, he realizes they need to solve this case quickly if the woman in them is to survive. If that wasn't enough for the human who was placed in a nightmare along with a bunch of wolves, being told you had two mates would definitely cause a few more problems, especially when one is male.Kane faces a mate who won't acknowledge him. For a wolf, this can be devastating, he knows because every time he tries to get close and Vander pulls back, he feels his heart break a little more.The Atlanta Pack Alpha has had his share of problems with running a pack but as things start to surface this time, he realizes it has turned personal. Who is he to put his trust in, surely not the two men who threaten to change the dynamics in his family.Can they stop the reign of a man who is locked up? Will a change in the Atlanta Pack be for the better—or worse? Do three find everything they have ever wanted and become one? Come to Atlanta and find the answers.
author: Jana Leigh
